articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: Monica Roberts, a Black trans journalist who covered the killings of trans women before national media did, dies at 58
articles.description: Through her work with the award-winning blog TransGriot, Roberts provided a blueprint for the national media on how to report about trans people with sensitivity and empathy. " name="twitter:description
articles.content:
(CNN)Monica Roberts had no predecessor. Before her groundbreaking blog, there were few news sites for Black transgender women like her.
